thread.title: Make a splash in Orlando this summer
thread.title_full: Make a splash in Orlando this summer | www.palmbeachpost.com

author: Mary Thurwachter
title: Make a splash in Orlando this summer
text:
Orlando World Center Marriott is trying to lure in guests with a Celebrate Summer escape, with rates starting at $144 a night. The deal includes a $25 nightly resort credit.
The resort, 1½ miles from Walt Disney World and minutes from SeaWorld, Discovery Cove, Aquatica and Universal Studios Orlando, features an iconic Falls Pool Oasis with a new slide tower, two 200-foot winding waterslides and one 90-foot speed water slide.
Other amenities include the championship golf course, Bill Madonna Golf Academy at Hawk’s Landing Golf Club, a full-service spa and fitness center, as well as 10 restaurants and lounges, including a food court.
The summer package is good through Sept. 7.
For more information, call 800-380-7931 or visit www.worldcentermarriott.com .
</span
